articles.description: Britain's Noah Williams pulls off a stunning final-round dive to take bronze in the men's 10m platform to win a second medal of the Paris Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics diving: Noah Williams takes bronze in 10m platform

articles.description: The top five stories from day 15 at the Paris Olympics as Tamirat Tola sets a new Olympic record in the men's marathon and Team GB's Erin McNeice misses out on a sport climbing medal.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Top five stories from day 15 of the 2024 Games

articles.description: Algeria's Imane Khelif speaks about "attacks" on her gender eligibility from "enemies of success" after winning gold in the 66kg women’s boxing at the Paris Olympics.
articles.title: Imane Khelif: Women’s 66kg boxing champion after winning gold at Paris 2024

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Emma Hayes leads USA to women's football gold in her first major tournament with the team.
articles.title: Brazil 0-1 United States: Emma Hayes leads USA to Olympic gold

articles.description: Man Utd vs Man City LIVE: Community Shield football kick-off time, prediction, team news & updates from Wembley
articles.title: Man Utd vs Man City LIVE: Community Shield football kick-off time, line-ups, prediction & updates from Wembley

articles.description: Ethiopia's Tamirat Tola dominates the men's marathon in Paris to win in an Olympic record time as Team GB's Emile Cairess finishes fourth.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Emile Cairess fourth as Tamirat Tola wins men's marathon

articles.description: Rachael Gunn failed to score a single point with the judges as she lost all three of her breaking round-robin battles.
articles.title: Olympic breaking: Criticism of viral breakdancer Rachael Gunn - Raygun - condemned by Australia team

articles.description: Veteran hooker Agustin Creevy scores the decisive try as Argentina stun New Zealand 38-30 in Wellington.
articles.title: Rugby Championship: Argentina stun New Zealand in Wellington
